verses.verse: I WILL lift up mine eyes to the mountain from whence comes my help.
My help comes from the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
He will not allow your foot to be moved; he who keeps you will not slumber.
Behold, he who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
The LORD is your keeper; the LORD will protect you with his right hand.
The sun shall not smite you by day, nor the moon by night.
The LORD will preserve you from all evil; he will preserve your soul.
The LORD will preserve your going out and your coming in from this time forth and even for evermore.
